name: XYRelPortLocator
description:
Create a locator for a relative x/y coordinate position. The coordinates are named in percentage [0..100%] relative to the top/left corner of the parent node.


Resize the shape in the example to see what happens. The port top position is always 20% of the shape height.

parameters.name: xPercentage
parameters.description: the x coordinate in percent of the port relative to the left of the parent

parameters.name: yPercentage
parameters.description: the y coordinate in percent of the port relative to the top of the parent

functions.name: relocate
functions.description: Controls the location of an I{@link draw2d.Figure}

constructor.name: XYRelPortLocator
